document.full_text: osama bin laden was actively engaged in directing his far-flung network in plots against the united states from the compound in pakistan where he was killed, a senior u.s. intelligence official said as new video images of the al qaeda leader were released on saturday.
document.title: bin laden directed qaeda from pakistan compound
lines_and_colors: osama bin laden was actively engaged in directing his far-flung network in plots against the united states from the compound in pakistan where he was killed, a senior u.s. intelligence official said as new video images of the al qaeda leader were released on saturday.
